in the kde mrg
Open kcontrol.
Desktop - Behavior
File Icons tab
Check what you want previews for.
Look in konqueror - settings - configure konqueror - "previews and meta-data"
I suggest checking all local protocols and seeing what happens.
If that doesn't work, use google. In particular, this is the first result I got for "konqueror video previews" : http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/showthread.php?t=299762
It looks very helpful.
From that page, this in particular is exactly relevant to ubuntu: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=3307
If none of THAT helps you, I'm sorry, but I'm out of ideas.
Next time ask on #kubuntu for KDE questions. Also, google is your friend.
